name: Ancient Loremaster
description_text: It’s astonishing what you find in old books. Look at this—nearly complete schematics for a war automaton, gathering dust because nobody here reads Zaliac.
prerequisite: You find a trove of forgotten books.

benefits.name: Leverage
benefits.description: Know a priceless secret; in a negotiation with an appropriate person you can offer it to increase their interest by 3 (max 5) once.

benefits.name: Rare Books
benefits.description: When you undertake a research project, roll 1d6 per dead language you know and add total to the project roll.

benefits.name: Susurrus Codex
benefits.description: Follow the book’s whispered advice: edge on Reason tests, bane on Presence tests. Stop anytime; then no advice for rest of day.

name: Battleaxe Diplomat
description_text: We seem to be equals in might and combat prowess. Perhaps we should bandy words awhile instead.
prerequisite: Gain the friendship or alliance of a creature you once battled.

benefits.name: Iron Hand in Velvet Glove
benefits.description: First negotiation Intimidate test without appealing to motivation doesn’t lower patience or interest regardless of result.

benefits.name: Truce!
benefits.description: Double edge on tests to stop combat and start a negotiation.

benefits.name: Warriors’ Understanding
benefits.description: Edge on Presence tests to interact with creatures you have fought in combat encounters.

name: Brawler
description_text: We won’t kill you. But you might wish we had.
prerequisite: Triumph in battle without killing any foes.

benefits.name: Duck!
benefits.description: When struck while a second creature flanks you, redirect the strike to that second creature (triggered). Regain after 1+ Victories.

benefits.name: Furniture Fighter
benefits.description: Improvised or non-kit weapon abilities benefit from your kit’s melee weapon damage bonus.

benefits.name: Headbutt
benefits.description: While grabbed or restrained, your free strikes don’t take a bane from those conditions.

benefits.name: If I Wanted You Dead, You’d Be Dead
benefits.description: When you defeat foes without killing them, edge on negotiation tests with those foes.

name: City Rat
description_text: Stay out all night, visit the dives. Get in a fight, run from the cops. That’s the real city.
prerequisite: Spend at least five respites in a metropolis.

benefits.name: Discerning Shopper
benefits.description: When seeking an item prerequisite for a crafting project, recall someone who might have it or information about it.

benefits.name: One with the Crowd
benefits.description: While using one or more creatures as cover, edge on tests to hide and sneak.

benefits.name: Street Smart
benefits.description: While in a settlement, you can’t be surprised.

name: Doomed
description_text: A haunting vision of your own death shapes your fate.
prerequisite: Not a hakaan and have witnessed the death of a hakaan.

benefits.name: Doomed Fate
benefits.description: While at 0 Stamina but conscious you can become doomed: can’t regain Stamina, auto tier 3 on tests and power rolls, die only at negative Stamina max; die at encounter end.

name: Dwarven Legionnaire
description_text: Stand fast and do not yield.
prerequisite: Fight alongside three or more dwarves.

benefits.name: Close Formation
benefits.description: While adjacent to two or more allies, +2 stability.

benefits.name: Rune of Alarm
benefits.description: Spend 10 minutes to inscribe rune. Activates when enemy within 2; you wake if asleep; perceive through it for 1 minute; sheds light 2 squares.

benefits.name: Stonemeld
benefits.description: Adjacent to stone wall: maneuver for concealment until you leave square or use an ability.

name: Elemental Dabbler
description_text: You harness a fragment of elemental power.
prerequisite: Defeat a creature with the Elemental keyword.

benefits.name: Elemental Blaster
benefits.description: Gain Elementalist 1st-level Hurl Element feature dealing chosen damage type (from defeated creature’s immunity).

benefits.name: Elemental Immunity
benefits.description: Immunity to chosen damage type equal to highest characteristic score.

benefits.name: Elemental Weapons
benefits.description: Your damage-dealing weapon abilities can deal the chosen type instead of normal type.

name: Faction Member
description_text: Promising recruit in an organization.
prerequisite: Join an army, guild, or similar organization.

benefits.name: Academic Faction
benefits.description: Sage makes up to three Reason tests or research project rolls for you (+5), 10 minutes each, not requiring a respite.

benefits.name: Guild Faction
benefits.description: Expert crafter makes up to three crafting project rolls for you (+5), 10 uninterrupted minutes each, no respite required.

benefits.name: Martial Faction
benefits.description: Recruit up to three minions (levels ≤ yours) appropriate to faction for a day.

benefits.name: Spy Faction
benefits.description: Agent provides three pieces of settlement information (hidden person, secret entrance, motivations/pitfalls).

special: Can take multiple times, once per faction; can be stripped if acting against faction. Use benefit only in settlement with faction presence and once per task completion.

name: Local Hero
description_text: The community owes you everything.
prerequisite: Save a community from certain destruction.

benefits.name: Easy Marks
benefits.description: Edge on interpersonal & intrigue skill tests influencing members of a community you saved.

benefits.name: Local Fame
benefits.description: Earn 1 Renown.

benefits.name: A New Dawn
benefits.description: Each respite in that community grants party 1 hero token (expires end of next respite).

name: Mage Hunter
description_text: Vigilant against dangerous magic.
prerequisite: Defeat three leader/solo creatures each with a Magic ability.

benefits.name: Arcane Dampening
benefits.description: Resisting potencies from magic abilities: characteristics count as 1 higher.

benefits.name: Oh No, You Don’t!
benefits.description: Adjacent creature uses Magic ability: make a free strike (triggered).

benefits.name: Stink of Magic
benefits.description: Maneuver: sense creature type (construct, undead, otherworld) and if used magic within hour; cannot be surprised by them.

name: Marshal
description_text: Relentless enforcer of the law.
prerequisite: Join criminal-hunting organization or be deputized.

benefits.name: Guess It’s the Hard Way Then
benefits.description: First time you take damage before first turn when not surprised: halve that damage.

benefits.name: Heedless Pursuer
benefits.description: Once per turn free maneuver: take 1d6 irreducible damage to ignore difficult terrain and +1 square to jumps until end of turn.

benefits.name: Silver Shield
benefits.description: Badge grants My Life for Yours feature (censor); can’t spend wrath unless you have Wrath feature.

benefits.name: Trained Tracker
benefits.description: Edge on tests to track criminals.

name: Monster Bane
description_text: Feared by beasts and monsters alike.
prerequisite: Defeat a leader or solo creature with Reason −2 or lower (e.g., arixx).

benefits.name: Beast Bane
benefits.description: Creatures with Animal keyword take a bane on strikes against you.

benefits.name: Monster Soother
benefits.description: Edge on tests to calm or tame nonsapient creatures.

benefits.name: Monster Trophy
benefits.description: Display a trophy: edge on tests to intimidate sapient creatures.

name: Owed a Favor
description_text: A powerful faction stands ready to repay you (within limits).
prerequisite: Successfully perform a service for a powerful faction.

benefits.name: Faction Favor
benefits.description: Faction performs one favor for the party if it doesn’t conflict with its goals.

benefits.name: Knowledge Network
benefits.description: Gain appropriate crafting/lore skill in faction settlement; if already trained, edge with that skill.

name: Presumed Dead
description_text: You return from an apparent death.
prerequisite: Die in a way preventing recovery or examination of body.

benefits.name: Narrow Escape
benefits.description: Regain 1 Stamina, spend Recoveries; gain 1st-echelon trinket; later rejoin party dramatically with explanation.

name: Ratcatcher
description_text: You specialize in bringing down the small and troublesome.
prerequisite: Defeat a leader or solo creature size 1S or smaller.

benefits.name: Come Out to Play
benefits.description: You have an ability (details not transcribed) paid with class Heroic Resource.

benefits.name: Deadly and Big
benefits.description: +3 damage bonus on strikes vs creatures smaller than you.

benefits.name: Everybody Move!
benefits.description: Knockback maneuver: target one extra same-size creature or two extra smaller creatures.

name: Saved for a Worse Fate
description_text: Captured instead of slain; a darker fate looms.
prerequisite: Entire party killed or captured by sapient foes.

benefits.name: Gladiators
benefits.description: Fight for captors’ amusement; opponents guard trinket or leveled treasure you can earn.

benefits.name: Prey
benefits.description: +1 speed and +2 Recoveries until end of next respite via draught.

benefits.name: Sacrifices
benefits.description: Being prepared for sacrifice: each hero earns 1 Wealth.

benefits.name: Saviors
benefits.description: Captors fear stronger foe; defeat it and keep treasure.

name: Ship Captain
description_text: Leader of a crew in pursuit of glory.
prerequisite: Acquire a ship, airship, or similar vessel.

benefits.name: Deep-Sea Diver
benefits.description: Automatically swim at full speed while moving.

benefits.name: Ship Speaker
benefits.description: Know location of any party-controlled ship; telepathic communication with anyone aboard regardless of distance.

benefits.name: Signal Flags
benefits.description: Communicate/ negotiate with another ship up to 5 miles away (line of effect); edge on Presence tests for such negotiation.

benefits.name: Trained Crewmember
benefits.description: Edge on tests to handle air or sea vessels.

name: Troupe Leading Player
description_text: Leader and star of a performing troupe.
prerequisite: Party successfully performs as troupe of entertainers.

benefits.name: Flying Circus
benefits.description: Triggered: push adjacent willing ally 2 (or 4 if smaller); ally may maneuver pre-fall to reduce fall by 2.

benefits.name: Spotlight
benefits.description: Illuminate creature within 10 for 1 minute (or until >10 away/dismissed); illuminated can’t sneak/hide, bane on secret action tests, edge on Lead/Music/Perform tests.

benefits.name: Supporting Player
benefits.description: Edge on group Presence tests and assisting another creature’s Presence test.

benefits.name: Work the Crowd
benefits.description: While ally performs music/performance: edge on conceal, hide, pick pockets, sneak tests.

name: Wanted Dead or Alive
description_text: Outlaw with a price on your head.
prerequisite: Declared an outlaw by a governmental authority.

benefits.name: Honor Among Thieves
benefits.description: Renown considered 2 higher when negotiating with criminals.

benefits.name: Minion Mower
benefits.description: Melee strike vs minion with another minion in distance: +3 damage.

benefits.name: No, You’re Under Arrest!
benefits.description: Edge on Escape Grab; succeeding escaping bonds/manacles lets you transfer them to adjacent same-size creature unnoticed.

name: Zombie Slayer
description_text: Vanquisher of the undead.
prerequisite: Defeat a leader or solo creature with the Undead keyword (e.g., ghost).

benefits.name: Blessed Weapons
benefits.description: Your damage-dealing weapon abilities can deal holy damage instead of normal type.

benefits.name: Divine Health
benefits.description: Corruption immunity equal to highest characteristic score; you can’t become undead.

benefits.name: Holy Terror
benefits.description: You have an ability (details not transcribed) paid with class Heroic Resource.

name: Arena Fighter
description_text: Brutal combat entertainer with a signature move.
prerequisite: Victorious in arena or public combat contest.

benefits.name: Dirty Fighting
benefits.description: While standing, melee strikes +3 damage vs prone; being prone doesn’t impose bane on your strikes.

benefits.name: Foes as Weapons
benefits.description: Grabbed same-size-or-smaller creature can be used as weapon for melee free strike; both it and target take damage.

benefits.name: Instant Celebrity
benefits.description: Earn 1 Renown.

benefits.name: Showstopper
benefits.description: You have an ability (details not transcribed) paid with class Heroic Resource.

name: Awakened
description_text: Psionic potential released by a foe’s death.
prerequisite: Defeat leader or solo with Psionic ability.

benefits.name: Foresight
benefits.description: No bane when using abilities against concealed creatures.

benefits.name: Rogue Talent
benefits.description: Gain a 1st-level talent class triggered action (clarity requires feature).

benefits.name: Telepathy
benefits.description: Maneuver: telepathic communication within 10 squares with a language-sharer; they can respond.

name: Battlefield Commander
description_text: Field leader forging victory.
prerequisite: Lead an army in battle and win.

benefits.name: Charge!
benefits.description: You have an ability (details not transcribed).

benefits.name: Renowned Warrior
benefits.description: Earn 1 Renown.

benefits.name: Student of War
benefits.description: Choose a 1st-level tactician doctrine feature; gain it even without Tactical Doctrine.

name: Blood Magic
description_text: Forbidden sanguine arts empower your spells.
prerequisite: Participate in a Discover Lore project to learn forbidden knowledge.

benefits.name: Blood Mage
benefits.description: Area Magic/Psionic ability: take level damage (irreducible) to increase area by 1 (line: one dimension) for encounter; once per ability use.

benefits.name: Bloody Murder
benefits.description: On strike dealing rolled damage: take level damage to deal double that corruption damage (once per ability); if target reduced to 0 by that corruption damage, it explodes and you regain lost Stamina (not usable on bloodless creatures).

benefits.name: I Reject This Evil Power!
benefits.description: Corruption immunity equal to your level.

name: Corsair
description_text: Dread pirate of the high seas.
prerequisite: Have Ship Captain title and sink or capture equal/greater ship.

benefits.name: Artillerist
benefits.description: +5 damage when using a ship’s weapons.

benefits.name: Black Flag
benefits.description: Iconic flag: enemy crews with line of effect take bane on strikes vs your ship or crew.

benefits.name: Fearsome Reputation
benefits.description: Earn 1 Renown.

benefits.name: Scoundrel Tactics
benefits.description: While aboard ship, Disguise/Intimidate/Hide/Sneak to influence another ship up to 5 miles (line of effect); gain edge.

name: Faction Officer
description_text: Authority figure within your faction.
prerequisite: Have Faction Member title and greatly advance faction goals.

benefits.name: Requisition
benefits.description: Gain 1st/2nd-echelon magic trinket; can swap on leveling.

benefits.name: You’re the Boss
benefits.description: Lower ranks follow routine orders; edge influencing them in nonroutine matters.

name: Fey Friend
description_text: Blessed by an immortal revel.
prerequisite: Eat and drink with an elf monarch or archfey.

benefits.name: Gift of Charm
benefits.description: Gain one interpersonal skill of your choice.

benefits.name: Gift of Foresight
benefits.description: Intuition score counts as 1 higher when resisting potencies.

benefits.name: Gift of Knowledge
benefits.description: Edge on tests using any lore skill group skill.

name: Giant Slayer
description_text: Foe of towering giants.
prerequisite: Defeat a leader or solo creature with Giant keyword.

benefits.name: Smallfolk Dodge
benefits.description: Creatures size 2+ take bane on strikes against you.

benefits.name: The Harder They Fall
benefits.description: You have an ability (details not transcribed).

benefits.name: Up the Beanstalk
benefits.description: Gain Climb skill or edge with it; while climbing a creature: its strikes vs you double bane; you double edge to stay on.

name: Godsworn
description_text: Marked by divine favor.
prerequisite: Do or promise a favor for an agent of a god or saint.

benefits.name: Healing Gift
benefits.description: Use Conduit Healing Grace 1st-level feature as if spending 1 piety; regain after 1+ Victories.

benefits.name: Last-Ditch Prayer
benefits.description: Free maneuver: gain 2d10 Heroic Resource pool for turn; regain after service or level up.

benefits.name: Touched by the Divine
benefits.description: Choose god/saint domain; gain a Conduit 1st-level domain feature.

name: Heist Hero
description_text: Master planner of daring thefts.
prerequisite: Have Troupe Leading Player title and execute a planned theft successfully.

benefits.name: Mother Hen
benefits.description: Spend 10 minutes: up to five willing creatures within 10 squares gain telepathic link with you & each other for 1 hour.

benefits.name: Sneakers
benefits.description: Gain Sneak skill or edge with it; in group tests, can both use Sneak and assist another using Sneak.

benefits.name: Timely Distraction
benefits.description: You have a triggered action (details not transcribed).

name: Knight
description_text: Sworn blade of a noble power.
prerequisite: Granted knighthood or similar rank by a noble or monarch.

benefits.name: Heraldic Fame
benefits.description: Earn 1 Renown.

benefits.name: Knightly Aegis
benefits.description: +6 Stamina maximum.

benefits.name: Knightly Challenge
benefits.description: You have an ability (details not transcribed).

special: May be called to perform duties for the granting authority.

name: Master Librarian
description_text: Keeper of deep and arcane knowledge.
prerequisite: Have Ancient Loremaster title and complete Discover Lore project for lost/forbidden knowledge.

benefits.name: Arcane Improvisation
benefits.description: When using damage-dealing magic signature ability, change its damage type to acid, cold, corruption, fire, lightning, poison, or sonic.

benefits.name: I Have Just the Book
benefits.description: Start Discover Lore project in stronghold/base: immediately gain 60 project points (complete if ≤60) in 10 minutes w/o respite.

benefits.name: Picked Up a Few Things
benefits.description: Gain one lore skill.

benefits.name: Polyglot
benefits.description: Know two languages; Learn New Language project goal is halved for you.

name: Special Agent
description_text: Entrusted with a critical secret mission.
prerequisite: Given an important secret mission by a spymaster.

benefits.name: Boffin
benefits.description: Gain a boffin device; once per encounter activate a property (see properties list).

benefits.name: Caustic Alchemy
benefits.description: Choose 1st-level shadow college Coat the Blade or Smoke Bomb; can’t spend insight unless you have the Insight feature.

benefits.name: Spy Ring
benefits.description: Magic jewelry: main action adopt illusory appearance of observed individual within 10; auto succeed Disguise tests based on visual ID.

special: Boffin Properties: edge Disguise test; unlock touched mundane lock; remote observe square within 10 (no line of effect); throw for 2d10 + level fire damage 5 cube (destroys boffin).

name: Sworn Hunter
description_text: Pursuer of criminal organizations to the bitter end.
prerequisite: Have Marshal title and take down an entire criminal organization.

benefits.name: Hunter’s Oath
benefits.description: Main action: swear oath vs creature within 10 (line of effect); know direction if within 50 miles; your damage-dealing abilities +5 damage vs target until death or new oath.

benefits.name: Particular Set of Skills
benefits.description: Gain one intrigue skill.

benefits.name: We’re In This Together
benefits.description: If you have a creature grabbed and take damage from another source’s ability, grabbed creature takes same damage.

name: Undead Slain
description_text: Returned from death by undead hands.
prerequisite: Killed by an undead creature.

benefits.name: Ghoul or Vampire
benefits.description: Melee free strike vs adjacent: bite on tier 3 to gain temp Stamina equal to damage (lasts until end of next respite).

benefits.name: Incorporeal Undead
benefits.description: Move through creatures/objects; first pass-through per round deals corruption damage = half level; no damage from being forced into objects.

benefits.name: Other Corporeal Undead
benefits.description: Reduced to 0 by non-fire/holy & body intact: regain half Stamina and fall prone (once per 10+ Victories).

special: Gain corruption immunity equal to level; if die again you rise as undead under Director’s control.

name: Unstoppable
description_text: You refuse to fall even when mortally wounded.
prerequisite: Defeat a foe while at or below 0 Stamina.

benefits.name: From Hell’s Heart
benefits.description: While winded, melee strikes +3 damage.

benefits.name: Furious Attack
benefits.description: Gain a fury class signature ability (ferocity usage requires feature).

benefits.name: Furious Charge
benefits.description: Charge action: strike gains damage bonus equal to squares moved.

name: Armed and Dangerous
description_text: Weapon mastery despite lacking kit support.
prerequisite: Cannot use kits and defeat five non-minion enemies using non-Magic/Psionic weapon abilities.

benefits.name: Kit Access
benefits.description: You can use and gain benefits of kits.

name: Back From the Grave
description_text: Returned from death to settle unfinished business.
prerequisite: Die at hands of greatest foe who still lives and not a revenant.

benefits.name: Tough But Withered
benefits.description: Gain the Tough But Withered signature trait from revenant ancestry.

name: Demon Slayer
description_text: Scourge of demonic entities.
prerequisite: Defeat or be possessed by leader/solo with Demon keyword.

benefits.name: Demonic Lore
benefits.description: Know Proto-Ctholl; when using magic ability you may change damage type to holy.

benefits.name: Lethe
benefits.description: While winded, strikes +5 damage.

benefits.name: Made of Teeth
benefits.description: Physical contact or creature starts turn touching you: deal 5 damage (no action).

benefits.name: Soulsight
benefits.description: Creatures within 2 squares can’t be hidden from you.

special: Presence test natural 5 or lower: cursed to speak only Proto-Ctholl for 1 minute.

name: Diabolist
description_text: Power bargained from infernal forces.
prerequisite: Defeat leader/solo with Devil keyword or make a deal with a devil.

benefits.name: Devil Lore
benefits.description: Know Anjali; potencies of magic/psionic abilities targeting Reason, Intuition, or Presence increase by 1.

benefits.name: Infernal Legacy
benefits.description: Gain 3 ancestry points for purchased devil ancestry traits.

benefits.name: Sly Devil
benefits.description: Gain Silver Tongue signature trait from devil ancestry.

benefits.name: Untouched by Corruption
benefits.description: Damage-dealing abilities can deal holy damage instead of normal type.

name: Dragon Blooded
description_text: Infused with dragon’s heartblood.
prerequisite: Defeat a leader or solo creature with Dragon keyword.

benefits.name: Dragon Scaled
benefits.description: Gain Wyrmplate signature trait from dragon knight ancestry.

benefits.name: Dragon Touched
benefits.description: Gain 3 ancestry points for purchased dragon knight ancestry traits.

name: Fleet Admiral
description_text: Commander of a feared fleet.
prerequisite: Have Corsair title and lead a fleet of at least three ships.

benefits.name: First Mate
benefits.description: Gain a pirate retainer whose level scales to yours.

benefits.name: Swashbuckler
benefits.description: Automatically climb at full speed while moving.

benefits.name: Treasure Keeper
benefits.description: Earn 1 Wealth.

benefits.name: Weather Wizard
benefits.description: Once per day 10-minute ritual alters mundane weather (5-mile radius) for 6 hours (choose Calm/Fog/High Winds/Light Winds/Storm with listed effects).

name: Maestro
description_text: You have heard the Music of Creation.
prerequisite: Visit realms of immortals and hear a note of the Music of Creation.

benefits.name: Angelic Chorus
benefits.description: Choose troubadour class act triggered action; gain it (drama replaced by your class Heroic Resource).

benefits.name: Devil’s Opera
benefits.description: You have an ability (details not transcribed).

benefits.name: Music of the Spheres
benefits.description: Main action: until start of your next turn, any creature within 10 making a strike takes 8 sonic; you also take 8 sonic when you strike.

name: Master Crafter
description_text: Artisan of legendary creations.
prerequisite: Complete downtime project to imbue item with 9th-level enhancement.

benefits.name: Masterpiece
benefits.description: Item can be imbued a fourth time with any qualifying enhancement.

benefits.name: Research Dividends
benefits.description: Gain item prerequisite for an enhancement and learn its project source language.

benefits.name: Skilled Hands
benefits.description: Gain a relevant crafting skill; if already have it, edge on tests with it and gain second crafting skill of choice.

benefits.name: Strong Hands Make Light Work
benefits.description: May use Might for project rolls.

name: Noble
description_text: Bearer of an honored title and its obligations.
prerequisite: Granted a noble rank by monarch or important noble.

benefits.name: I Know How to Talk to These People
benefits.description: Edge on Presence tests with royals, nobles, and feudal followers aware of your rank.

benefits.name: Noble Splendor
benefits.description: Earn 1 Renown and 1 Wealth.

benefits.name: Retinue
benefits.description: Followers cap increases by two.

special: May be called upon to perform duties for grantor.

name: Planar Voyager
description_text: Traveler of bizarre worlds and vehicles.
prerequisite: Voyage in strange vehicles on different worlds.

benefits.name: Prismacore Eyes
benefits.description: Psychic immunity 10; opponents can’t locate/read thoughts magically unless allowed; +3 stability vs magic/psionic abilities.

benefits.name: Stellar Knowledge
benefits.description: Gain Mechanics skill or edge with it; also gain item prerequisite and project source for a psionic trinket.

benefits.name: Time Raider Training
benefits.description: Gain 2 ancestry points for purchased time raider ancestry traits.

name: Scarred
description_text: Battle scars that empower resilience.
prerequisite: An enemy leader or solo reduces you to 0 Stamina.

benefits.name: Lasting Mark
benefits.description: Gain visible scar; +20 Stamina max; scar maker takes bane on abilities against you.

special: Can gain multiple times; subsequent gains do not further increase Stamina max (typo corrected).

name: Siege Breaker
description_text: Defender and breaker of fortifications.
prerequisite: Have Battlefield Commander title and lead defense of settlement/fortification.

benefits.name: Death From Above
benefits.description: Edge from high ground grants +8 damage bonus to the ability.

benefits.name: Hold the Line
benefits.description: Within 5 squares of an ally: you and allies within 5 gain +3 stability.

benefits.name: Last Defender
benefits.description: Ally within 5 reduced to 0: gain temp Stamina equal to ally level (1 if no level); if already have temp from this, add amount instead.

name: Teacher
description_text: Mentor to the next generation.
prerequisite: Train or command at least three lower-level members of your class.

benefits.name: Apprentice
benefits.description: Travel with non-combat student (1st-level of your class) sharing your skills; assists can’t yield worse than tier 2 outcome.

name: Champion Competitor
description_text: World-class victor in contest of skill.
prerequisite: Beat the best in the world at a game or sport.

benefits.name: Best of the Best
benefits.description: Choose a competition skill: +4 bonus (instead of +2) to tests using it.

benefits.name: Glory and Riches
benefits.description: Earn 2 Renown and 1 Wealth.

benefits.name: I’ll Just Take the Prize
benefits.description: Gain a trinket or leveled treasure of Director’s choice.

name: Demigod
description_text: Ascended to near-divine status.
prerequisite: Have Godsworn title and mortals complete divine ritual in your name.

benefits.name: Immortal Excellence
benefits.description: Increase a characteristic by 1 (max 6).

benefits.name: Longevity
benefits.description: Natural lifespan doubles; can appear any age.

benefits.name: Worshippers
benefits.description: Magically hear prayers directed to you.

benefits.name: Acolytes
benefits.description: Followers cap increases by two.

benefits.name: Divine Weapons
benefits.description: Damage-dealing weapon abilities can deal corruption or holy damage instead of normal type.

benefits.name: Missionaries
benefits.description: Earn 2 Renown.

name: Enlightened
description_text: Mind expanded by cosmic truth.
prerequisite: Learn a cosmic truth altering understanding of reality.

benefits.name: Cosmic Revelation
benefits.description: Lore skill test tier 1/2 outcome may become tier 3 (once per 1+ Victories).

benefits.name: Mind Over Matter
benefits.description: Whenever you spend a Recovery, end one condition on yourself.

benefits.name: Rearrange the Game Pieces
benefits.description: Start of combat: reposition self or creature within 5 to chosen space (safe) unnoticed; only you recall prior position.

name: Forsaken
description_text: You continue after losing an artifact of power.
prerequisite: Party loses/destroys/parts with an artifact.

benefits.name: Brief Reunion
benefits.description: While winded, maneuver to summon artifact for one round; once per 1+ Victories.

benefits.name: Perfect Protection
benefits.description: Director chooses artifact-related damage type; you have immunity to that type.

benefits.name: Poor Compensation
benefits.description: Artifact becomes a trinket or leveled treasure retaining shape, Director’s choice.

name: Monarch
description_text: Ruler of a nation with sweeping authority.
prerequisite: You or party member becomes monarch of a nation.

benefits.name: Royal Authority
benefits.description: Inhabitants must obey lawful orders or face consequences.

benefits.name: Royal Majesty
benefits.description: Increase Might or Presence by 1 (max 6).

benefits.name: Crown Jewels
benefits.description: Gain a national treasure (trinket of Director’s choice).

benefits.name: Royal Fame
benefits.description: Earn 2 Renown.

benefits.name: Royal Retinue
benefits.description: Followers cap increases by 2.

benefits.name: Royal Wealth
benefits.description: Earn 2 Wealth.

special: May be called upon for national duties.

name: Peace Bringer
description_text: Broker of high-stakes peace.
prerequisite: Conduct successful negotiation deciding fate of a nation or world.

benefits.name: Calm Heads Prevail
benefits.description: Tests to stop combat/start negotiation automatically tier 3.

benefits.name: Drop Your Sword
benefits.description: On success with Intimidate test, affected creatures drop held items.

benefits.name: Hear Me Out
benefits.description: While present, NPC starting patience +3 (max 5).

benefits.name: Many Paths to Peace
benefits.description: When using interpersonal skill group skill, use any characteristic of choice.

name: Reborn
description_text: Returned by higher powers to finish your task.
prerequisite: Die gloriously while on a quest for a higher power.

benefits.name: Holy Weapon
benefits.description: Gain a leveled treasure (Director’s choice).

benefits.name: Kill Me Once, Shame On You
benefits.description: Choose a keyword from a defeating creature; creatures with that keyword take bane on ability rolls vs you.

benefits.name: Memories of the Beyond
benefits.description: Gain two skills of your choice.

special: If a hakaan gains via Doomsight trait they lose that trait. Increase Intuition or Presence by 1 (max 6).

name: Theoretical Warrior
description_text: Scholar of battle turned practitioner.
prerequisite: Have Master Librarian title and complete Learn From a Master project (goal 1,000).

benefits.name: Heroic Study
benefits.description: Increase Reason or Intuition by 1 (max 6) and gain a heroic ability from any class (usable with your class resource; feature prerequisites still required).

name: Tireless
description_text: Ever-moving and unyielding endurance.
prerequisite: Have Unstoppable title and assist in montage test achieving full success.

benefits.name: Bounce Back Fast
benefits.description: Rest 8+ hours: may gain respite benefits (once per 1+ Victories).

benefits.name: Reserves of Strength
benefits.description: Recovery value = half Stamina.

benefits.name: Undying
benefits.description: Immune to bleeding condition.

name: Unchained
description_text: Escape artist beyond compare.
prerequisite: Have Heist Hero title and steal precious object or escape captivity while evading guards level 8+.

benefits.name: Bye-Bye
benefits.description: Maneuver: teleport self and willing allies within 5 to positions within 10 of origin; once per 1+ Victories.

benefits.name: Laughs at Locks
benefits.description: Tests to open locks/break restraints need no tools and automatically tier 3.

benefits.name: Slippery
benefits.description: Cannot be grabbed against your will.
